description: Using tgtd, targets are not getting properly because nova-volume/cinder is not getting the signal to update its targets.conf.
title: [tgtd] iscsi-targets are not getting created.

comments.content: Using tgtd, targets are not getting properly because nova-volume/cinder is not getting the signal to update its targets.conf.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/10628

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/10628
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/dcc26e8c414765754dbf568dcaa4490e62f0bc44

Branch:    master

commit dcc26e8c414765754dbf568dcaa4490e62f0bc44
Author: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jul 31 15:56:57 2012 -0500

    Update targets information when creating target.
    
    tgt-admin needs to use --execute --update to tell
    tgtd to re-read its configuration files when target
    is created.
    
    (LP: #1031509)
    
    Change-Id: I71fe4d90a8cc9bcf7a4817aefd6de52e216102a4
    Signed-off-by: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
